items.english:
Are you sure you wish to clear the persistent data path?
 This action cannot be reversed.
items.chinese:
确定要清空持久化数据路径吗？
该操作不可撤销。

items.english:
Are you sure you wish to clear PlayerPrefs?
This action cannot be reversed.
items.chinese:
确定要清空 PlayerPrefs 吗？
该操作不可撤销。

items.english: • Ask a question in our Easy Save 3 forums
items.chinese: • 在 Easy Save 3 论坛提问

items.english: • Ask a question in the Unity Forum thread
items.chinese: • 在 Unity 官方论坛提问

items.english:
Enter a type name in the field below
* Type names are case-sensitive *
items.chinese:
在下方输入类型名
* 类型名区分大小写 *

items.english: This type has no serializable fields or properties.
items.chinese: 该类型没有可序列化的字段或属性。

items.english: This type has no serializable fields.
items.chinese: 该类型没有可序列化字段。

items.english: This type has no serializable properties.
items.chinese: 该类型没有可序列化属性。

items.english: Click here to edit the ES3Type script
items.chinese: 点击此处编辑 ES3Type 脚本

items.english: Type not selected. Please ensure you select a type
items.chinese: 未选择类型，请先选择一个类型

items.english:
This type has no public parameterless constructors.

To support this type you will need to modify the ES3Type script to use a specific constructor instead of the parameterless constructor.
items.chinese:
该类型没有公共无参构造函数。

若需支持此类型，请修改 ES3Type 脚本以使用特定构造函数。

items.english:
This type has no public parameterless constructors.

To support this type you will need to select the fields you wish to serialize below, and then modify the generated ES3Type script to use a specific constructor instead of the parameterless constructor.
items.chinese:
该类型没有公共无参构造函数。

要支持该类型，请先在下方选择需要序列化的字段，再修改生成的 ES3Type 脚本以使用特定构造函数。

items.english: Select all fields and generate ES3Type script
items.chinese: 选择所有字段并生成 ES3Type 脚本

items.english: Enable Auto Save for this scene
items.chinese: 为该场景启用自动保存

items.english: We recommend against changing these settings unless instructed to do so by the documentation or by support.
items.chinese: 除非文档或技术支持要求，否则不建议修改这些设置。

items.english: Immediately commit cached data to file
items.chinese: 立即将缓存数据写入文件

items.english:
Right-click a prefab and select 'Easy Save 3 > Enable Easy Save for Scene' to enable Auto Save for it.

Your scene will also need to reference this prefab for it to be recognised.
items.chinese:
在预制体上右键选择“Easy Save 3 > Enable Easy Save for Scene”以启用自动保存。

场景也需要引用该预制体才能被识别。

items.english: Marking prefabs destroyed is not necessary
items.chinese: 不需要标记预制体为已销毁

items.english:
Marking prefabs as destroyed is not necessary because their destroyed state is implied by their absense from the save data.
For example if you destroy a prefab instance and save, it will not be in the save data so will never be created when you load.
items.chinese:
无需标记预制体为已销毁，因为其未出现在存档中即表示被销毁。
例如销毁一个预制体实例并保存后，加载时将不会被创建。

items.english: If toggled only previews animations that have AutoPlay turned ON
items.chinese: 仅预览已启用自动播放的动画

items.english: DOTween Preview ► Couldn't find tween to stop
items.chinese: DO补间 预览 ► 未找到要停止的补间
将所有预制体加入管理器
